kobuki_driver Documentation

kobuki_driver

C++ driver library for Kobuki: Pure C++ driver library for Kobuki. This is for those who do not wish to use ROS on their systems.

  • Homepage: http://ros.org/wiki/kobuki_driver

We are currently only supporting english documentation. If you'd like to translate, feel free to modify the contents of https://github.com/yujinrobot/kobuki/tree/hydro-devel/kobuki_driver/doxygen and send us a pull request.

  • English Guides
